name: The 12 Fractured Days of Christmas Multiple Choice Quiz | Brain Teasers | 10 Questions

questions.correct: five gold rings & five golden rings
questions.explanation:
five gold rings & five golden rings.

	My true love gave me these on the fifth day of Christmas.

questions.correct: A partridge in a pear tree
questions.explanation:
A partridge in a pear tree.

	The first day's gift.

questions.correct: Seven swans a-swimming & Seven swans a swimming
questions.explanation:
Seven swans a-swimming & Seven swans a swimming.

	My true love gave me these on the seventh day of Christmas.

twelve drummers drumming.

	The 12th day's present.

questions.correct: Six geese a-laying & Six geese a laying
questions.explanation:
Six geese a-laying & Six geese a laying.

	On the sixth day of Christmas my love-vah sent to me....

Nine ladies dancing.

	Day Nine's offering.

Three French hens.

	On the third day of Christmas...

questions.correct: Ten lords a-leaping & Ten lords a leaping
questions.explanation:
Ten lords a-leaping & Ten lords a leaping.

	This one creates a funny image--I picture these 10 guys as leaping frogs dressed in satin jackets and knee breeches and George Washington-style hair. Day 10 of the gift fest.

questions.correct: Eight maids a-milking & Eight maids a milking
questions.explanation:
Eight maids a-milking & Eight maids a milking.

	The eighth day's gift.

Two turtle doves & two turtledoves.

	...12 drummers drumming, 11 pipers piping, 10 lords a leaping, 9 ladies dancing, 8 maids a milking, 7 swans a swimming, 6 geese a laying, 5 go-old rings (pause), 4 calling birds, 3 French hens, 2 turtle doves...and a partridge in a pear tree! OR Shelve dimmers dumb mink, leaven vipers biking, tin loads asleep pink, noon laddies dense sink, ate mace amalgam, Evan swoons assuaging, sex geezer slaying, fife go-al drinks (pause), fur Colin beards, free fringe chins, do hurdle duffs...and apart dredge juniper three!
